item.title: SYIpkpker
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Justino Coder Justino
item.description:
@Coder_Justino wrote:

[quote=“defnoob285, post:8, topic:218744”]Just add the name syi to you code you will notice your code will look something like this!

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; }[/quote]
All those would work but I am not sure if they are 100%, there is a tut out for this just search it.

Read full topic

item.title: SYIpkpker
item.dc:creator: @defnoob285 defnoob285
item.description:
@defnoob285 wrote:

Just add the name syi to you code you will notice your code will look something like this!

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; }

item.title: SYIpkpker
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

jadese:

Really can’t do nothing. I usually IP ban it and it works.

You can do something, since the client (syipkpker) doesn’t actually login. Alls they do is make a null account but its a connection. Now unless the client has faked packet 14 you CAN block this. It was posted how here awhile back, but people were too dumb enough to think it would work.

Read full topic
